tool_description: Aggregates and consolidates brand mentions from multiple sources and time periods, providing unified metrics and trend analysis.

brand_names.description: Array of brand names to aggregate mentions for

mention_counts.description: Array of mention counts corresponding to each source

source_timestamps.description: Array of timestamps for each mention source

aggregation_period.description: Time period for aggregation (hourly, daily, weekly, monthly)

include_duplicates.description: Whether to include potential duplicate mentions in aggregation

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: mention_sources, mention_counts, and source_timestamps must have the same length
Empty brand names: At least one brand name must be provided
Invalid aggregation period: aggregation_period must be one of [hourly, daily, weekly, monthly]
Invalid timestamps: All source_timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 format
Negative mention counts: All mention counts must be non-negative integers
Too many sources: Maximum 50 mention sources allowed per aggregation
usage: Provide brand names, mention sources with corresponding counts and timestamps. Optionally set aggregation period and duplicate handling. Returns consolidated brand mention metrics.

total_mentions_per_brand.description: Array of total mention counts for each brand

mention_growth_rates.description: Array of growth rates (percentage) for each brand

peak_mention_periods.description: Array of timestamps indicating peak mention periods for each brand

source_distribution.description: Array showing distribution of mentions across sources

aggregation_summary.description: Summary of aggregation process and key findings
